episodes.title: Episode 6: Gaslighting
episodes.description: Part 3 on Thought Control and how MLMs keep their people! Gaslighting is thrown around a lot these days, but what is actually dangerous about it? Join in as Eryn shares a big example of gaslighting from her own MLM days. Also hear briefly from business experts Melissa & Corry (from The Business Reboot) on how gaslighting affects women in entrepreneurship as well as briefly from Megan Von Fricken, LCSW to learn about the function of self-gas lighting in harmful groups. You will hear more complete episodes further along in the series as each of these experts will have their own full show to dive deeper into these topics! For now- I've included them in the resources below. RESOURCES: Melissa & Corry of The Business Reboot: https://www.instagram.com/businessreboot/ https://thebusinessreboot.com Megan Von Fricken, LCSW: Religous Trauma & Cult Recovery https://www.instagram.com/reclaimingself.therapy/ https://meganvonfricken.com/blog/ Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: BONUS: The Numbers, Can I get to a liveable wage?
episodes.description: Second BONUS episode diving into the concrete numbers of MLMs! Can one achieve a livable wage through an MLM? And what are the odds? What about side hustle money? And what about going all the way to the top?! This episode scrutinizes my personal income and (big air quotes here) "MLM success story" as well as highlights the actual odds and stats for all the ranks, side hustle money all the way to pay $2 million in cash for your home kind of money. If you have your own data or story to share, please head over to @commoncultpod on IG and leave us a message! https://www.instagram.com/commoncultpod/ Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: Episode 5: Toxic Positivity & Roben's Story
episodes.description: Delving into Part 2 of our series on Thought Control and how MLMs keep their people. This week's episode features insights from Roben Clark, who shares her experiences of her time in Arbonne. Listen in for Roben's story and a discussion on toxic positivity. You can find Roben on IG @fitmomrob https://www.instagram.com/fitmomrob/ Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: Episode 4: Double Binds, Toxic Positivity, & Gaslighting, oh my!  Lauren's Story
episodes.description: Welcome to the first installment of this three-part series on the subtle (and sometimes not-so-subtle) mind control tactics employed by high-control groups and MLMs. Join us for Part 1 as we delve into the world of The Double Bind – what exactly is that, how does it impact us, and a firsthand account from Lauren Dunaway, who spent over 5 years in an MLM! You can find Lauren here: https://www.laurenefdunaway.com/ https://www.instagram.com/unlearningnutrition/ Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: Episode 3: Founder's Syndrome Part 2
episodes.description: Over the span of my decade-long involvement in my MLM, I had numerous encounters with my company founders during various leadership retreats and conventions. In this episode we get into the backfire effect, founder myths, and expand on Founder's Syndrome Part 2 with real-life examples. Mentions: Dr. Susanna Kislenko: @susannakislenko Dr. Janja Lalich @janja_lalich Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: Episode 2: Founder's Syndrome Part 1
episodes.description: Join in a fascinating and eye-opening conversation with Dr. Susanna Kislenko. As a social psychologist, Susanna studies leadership in the entrepreneurial context. More specifically, Susanna’s research focus is founder leadership past the founding (start-up) stage. Using qualitative research methods, Susanna’s work pulls back the curtain on the challenges and potentially darker organizational consequences of long-term founder leadership, including Founder’s Syndrome. Find Susana at https://www.susannakislenko.com/ and on IG @susannakislenko Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: Episode 1: Onramps
episodes.description: Welcome to the show! Thank you for joining us. This special Monday episode serves as a brief intro to both our show and the various pathways into the world of MLMs. Stay tuned- next episode, coming this Thursday! Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
